com.paperboyclone

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.paperboyclone.BasicGameEntity
      • com.paperboyclone.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBasicGameEntity

    public class Player
extends BasicGameEntity
    Player represents the user's Character in the game. It extends BasicGameEntity and cares for the interaction with the user and other entities.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Martin Freudenberg, Timo Kramer

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Player() 
      Player(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 position, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture texture)
      The initialization of a Player sets the position, a texture, basic velocity, a listener for the stats, animations and a BoundingBox for collisions.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void checkForMovement(float delta)
      regularly called method to poll for user input on keyboard or if no input occurs movement is set back to straight and normal speed.
      void draw(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch) 
      void moveFaster(float delta) 
      void moveLeft() 
      void moveRight() 
      void moveSlower(float delta) 
      void moveStraight(float delta) 
      <T> void onCollision(IBasicGameEntity collidedObject, java.lang.Class<T> Type)
      when a collision occurs, a sound is played and the player is respawned at a center position on screen
      void setMinSpeed(float mSpeed) 
      void throwLeft()
      Checks if a paper is available and if yes creates a Paper with velocity relative to Player-movement and position same as Player and adds it to the Gameworld.
      void throwRight()
      Checks if a paper is available and if yes creates a Paper with velocity relative to Player-movement and position same as Player and adds it to the Gameworld.
      void update(float delta)

        texture - the texture to draw on screen
